title: Winchester Model 1200
summary: The Model 1200 and Model 1300 are two pump-action shotguns that were manufactured by the Winchester-Western Division of Olin Corporation.  It was produced in 12-, 16- and 20-gauge.  The military version of the 1200 has the ability to have a bayonet fixed on the end of the barrel to be used in close quarters combat (CQC).[2]
